thread.title: Drake Celebrates Rihanna’s Birthday By Performing Collaboration Medley: Watch | Pitchfork
thread.title_full: Drake Celebrates Rihanna’s Birthday By Performing Collaboration Medley: Watch | Pitchfork

title: Drake Celebrates Rihanna’s Birthday By Performing Collaboration Medley: Watch | Pitchfork
text:
Open share drawer Drake Celebrates Rihanna’s Birthday By Performing Collaboration Medley: Watch “I wanna pay tribute tonight because it’s somebody’s birthday today—somebody that I’ve got a lot of love for and a lot of respect for” Photo by Karwai Tang/WireImage 
During his Boy Meets World tour stop in Dublin last night, Drake celebrated Rihanna ’s birthday by performing a medley of their collaborations. Watch clips below. “I wanna pay tribute tonight because it’s somebody’s birthday today—somebody that I’ve got a lot of love for and a lot of respect for,” Drake opened. “We just gonna do this in Dublin tonight: Instead of singing happy birthday we’re going to set it off just like this,” before jumping right into “ Work .” He also played “Take Care” and “ Too Good .” Drake did a tribute for Rihanna's bday before performing their collabs and I died!!! pic.twitter.com/NsMx7QkE4S
